title: (x) Animal Crossing community font - Fink Heavy {Claes}
content:
Hey,

I'm making some avatars for livejournal, and I was wondering if anyone could tell me if there is a font similar to the actual Animal Crossing one (top left hand corner of the following website), or if someone can recommend something similar?

Thanks in advance :)

Sharon

The website : [http://www.animalcrossingcommunity.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114142812/http:/www.animalcrossingcommunity.com/)
author: scarletsuicide

comments.content:
i think that's [Fink Heavy](http://web.archive.org/web/20141114142812/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=20) from House Industries.

..but maybe you knew that since you're asking for something similar?

Oh, no! I had no clue, and searched a bunch of sites with no luck. That one looks pretty similar so unless someone comes up with something better, it'll be that one I'll be using ;)

Thanks!
